verses.text: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, Even \add with\add* my glory.
Awake, psaltery and harp: I \add myself\add* will awake early.
I will praise thee, O \sc Lord\sc*, among the people: And I will sing \add praises\add* unto thee among the nations.
For thy mercy \add is\add* great above the heavens: And thy truth \add reacheth\add* unto the clouds.
Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: And thy glory above all the earth.
That thy beloved may be delivered; Save \add with\add* thy right hand, and answer me.
God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, And mete out the valley of Succoth.
Gilead \add is\add* mine; Manasseh \add is\add* mine; Ephraim also \add is\add* the strength of mine head; Judah \add is\add* my lawgiver;
Moab \add is\add* my washpot; Over Edom will I cast out my shoe; Over Philistia will I triumph.
Who will bring me \add into\add* the strong city? Who will lead me into Edom?
\add Wilt\add* not \add thou\add*, O God, \add who\add* hast cast us off? And wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?
Give us help from trouble: For vain \add is\add* the help of man.
Through God we shall do valiantly: For he \add it is that\add* shall tread down our enemies.
